pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extension to 'tmap' for Creating Glyphs // Provides new layer functions to 'tmap' for drawing glyphs. A glyph is a small chart (e.g., donut chart) shown at specific map locations to visualize multivariate or time-series data. The functions work with the syntax of 'tmap' and allow flexible control over size, layout, and appearance.
